Headline: #63 63rdTemporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to fire department activity at 63rd/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses are requested between Damen and Racine to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#8 Halsted

#50 Damen

#49 Western

#52 Kedzie/California

#53 Pulaski

#54 Cicero

#57 Laramie

#60 Blue Island/26th

#82 Kimball

#126 Jackson

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
